Header.title: PHISHPROOF
Header.paragraph: PhishProof is a comprehensive phishing detection tool, designed to help users identify and prevent online scams and cyber threats efficiently.

PhishingArticle.title: What is Phishing?
PhishingArticle.introduction: Phishing is a prevalent cyberattack that manipulates individuals into divulging sensitive information, such as usernames, passwords, or financial data, often through deceptive means like fraudulent emails, messages, or websites.
details: Phishing attacks cause billions in financial damage annually, affecting millions of individuals and organizations.
According to recent statistics, over 3.4 billion phishing emails are sent every day, targeting unsuspecting users globally.
Phishing can lead to devastating outcomes, including identity theft, financial fraud, and unauthorized access to confidential systems.

types.name: Email Phishing
types.description: The most common type, where attackers impersonate legitimate organizations through fraudulent emails.

types.name: Spear Phishing
types.description: A targeted form of phishing aimed at specific individuals or businesses.

types.name: Smishing
types.description: Phishing via SMS messages to lure victims into revealing sensitive data.

types.name: Vishing
types.description: Voice phishing, where attackers use phone calls to trick victims.

protectionTips: Be cautious with unsolicited communications asking for sensitive information.
Verify links before clicking and avoid opening unknown email attachments.
Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for added security.
Educate yourself and others about common phishing tactics.

Features.title: URL Checker
Features.text: Analyze and verify the safety of any URL to protect against phishing attacks.

Features.title: Email Checker
Features.text: Verify the authenticity of email messages and prevent phishing attempts.

Features.title: Free Tools
Features.text: Access a set of free phishing detection tools to safeguard your online presence.
